name: The Hatfield House rules
description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

key_work.title: Production design in The Favourite
key_work.headline_credit: Ireland, United Kingdom and United States, 2018
key_work.brief_description: England, early 18th century. The close relationship between Queen Anne and Sarah Churchill is threatened by the arrival of Sarah’s cousin, Abigail Hill, resulting in a bitter rivalry between the two cousins to be the Queen’s favourite.

constellations_primary.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_primary.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

start.title: Rebecca
start.creator_credit: Working Title Films, Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner, Nira Park, Sarah Greenwood, Julian Day, Anna Waterhouse and Joe Shrapnel
start.brief_description: After a whirlwind romance with a wealthy widower, a naïve bride moves to his family estate but can’t escape the haunting shadow of his late wife.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

end.title: Rebecca
end.creator_credit: United Artists and David O. Selznick
end.brief_description: Story of a young woman who marries a fascinating widower only to find out that she must live in the shadow of his former wife, Rebecca, who died mysteriously several years earlier.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

links.description: Rebecca (2020) is a remake of the classic thriller Rebecca (1940), based on Daphne Du Maurier’s novel Rebecca (1938).

start.title: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies
start.creator_credit: Natalie Portman, Sean McKittrick, Annette Savitch, Allison Shearmur and David Warren

video_links.name: Pride And Prejudice And Zombies - Official Trailer #1 (Feb 2016)
Pride and Prejudice and Zombies - Bloody Good Sneak Peek

start.brief_description: A zombie outbreak has fallen upon the land in this reimagining of Jane Austen’s classic tale of the tangled relationships between lovers from different social classes in 19th-century England.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

end.title: Rebecca
end.creator_credit: Working Title Films, Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner, Nira Park, Sarah Greenwood, Julian Day, Anna Waterhouse and Joe Shrapnel
end.brief_description: After a whirlwind romance with a wealthy widower, a naïve bride moves to his family estate but can’t escape the haunting shadow of his late wife.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

links.description: Pride and Prejudice and Zombies star Lily James portrays Mrs. de Winters in the 2020 film Rebecca, which was also filmed at Hatfield House.

start.title: Production design in The Favourite
start.headline_credit: Ireland, United Kingdom and United States, 2018
start.brief_description: England, early 18th century. The close relationship between Queen Anne and Sarah Churchill is threatened by the arrival of Sarah’s cousin, Abigail Hill, resulting in a bitter rivalry between the two cousins to be the Queen’s favourite.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

links.description: The video for the Jonas Brothers’ ‘Sucker’ was clearly inspired by The Favourite. Not only was it filmed at the same location (Hatfield House), it includes a number of direct nods to the film and its production design.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

end.title: Game of Thrones
end.creator_credit: Duncan Muggoch, Lisa McAtackney, Greg Spence, Christopher Newman, Paul Zeke, Devin Stoutley and Shaila Tobin

video_links.name: Game of Thrones | Season 1 | Official Trailer

end.brief_description: Seven noble families fight for control of the mythical land of Westeros. Friction between the houses leads to full-scale war. All while a very ancient evil awakens in the farthest north. Amidst the war, a neglected military order of misfits, the Night’s Watch, is all that stands between the realms of men and icy horrors beyond.

constellations_other.name: The Hatfield House rules
constellations_other.description: The shooting location of The Favourite, Hatfield House, has appeared in a number of other iconic works.

constellations_other.name: The narrative power of maps
constellations_other.description: Maps are designed to communicate complex information in a clear manner to aid both navigation and wayfinding and knowledge of place.

constellations_other.name: Significant sounds
constellations_other.description: The arrival of synchronised sound dramatically changed the movie business, allowing filmmakers to use sound in new and exciting ways which developed the use sound into own film language.

constellations_other.name: Magic lanterns and internet culture
constellations_other.description: The basic animation techniques of magic lanterns are strangely similar to internet aesthetics.

links.description: The music video features the three brothers Jonas, and their respective spouses, including Sophie Turner, most famous for her portrayal of Sansa Stark in Game of Thrones.

links.description: Sophie Turner’s Game of Thrones co-star Charles Dance is a stalwart of period films, including 2016’s shlocky Pride and Prejudice and Zombies, which was also filmed at Hatfield House.
